body.name: Bravo Sierra Body and Hair Mens Soap Bar All-In-One Shampoo & Soap for Men's Face, Hair & Body - Sandalwood & Fig, 7 oz - Coconut, Shea Butter and Oat Flour for Soft Skin and Healthy Hair

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: The Anti-Soap Bar: Bravo Sierra’s Hair & Body Solid Cleanser is an all-in-one body bar and solid shampoo. It’s formulated without soap, sulfates, or drying agents and works into a rich lather. One bar will last 30-40 showers. Sandalwood & Fig has an energizing and vibrant scent with notes of fig, tangerine, amber, and sandalwood.
Coconut-Derived Formula: Get an all-around clean without the harsh chemicals. This bar is enriched with coconut, shea butter, and oat kernel flour for soft, moisturized skin and conditioned hair.
Perfect for Packing Light: Developed with U.S. Military service members, the Hair & Body Solid Cleanser is a great option for an efficient shower or when you need to pack light.

Cradle to Cradle Bronze Certified: Does not contain parabens, phthalates, phenoxyethanol, silicones, sulfates, or PEGS. Vegan & Cruelty-Free. 99% biodegradable & carbon neutral manufacturing. Proud supporter of the Navy Seal Foundation. Made in the USA.

Military-Tested Bodycare for High Performance: Bravo Sierra is the only personal care company built with and for the U.S. Military. Each product is field-tested with 2,500 U.S. Military service members to meet the needs of those with active lives. From concept to manufacturing, the entire line is made with clean ingredients and sustainable packaging. 5% of all sales are directly contributed to MWR quality-of-life programs for active-duty service members, veterans, and their families.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product leave the skin feeling fresh and clean. Not dried out like many other soaps do. It lathers very well and smells great. Gets ride of the odors from the normal day or even a nice long workout. Over all this product is great and I would recommend it to anyone looking for a good smelling soap that gets rid of odors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My go to shampoo bar doubled in price, so I decided to try something new. I was a bit skeptical that this was a 2-in-1 body wash and shampoo, as I have fine textured southeast Asian hair and a lot of it. It lathered super easily and I was like oh no, this is going to be so drying. Imagine my surprise when my hair looked normal. It wasn't dry at all. It felt like my hair should!Other shampoo bars don't lather well, and when you get your hair lathered, the amount of bubbles drastically melts over time until it just gets watery and starts dripping. I don't have that problem with this one. It lathers and stays bubbly for a good amount of time.And it smells so good! I love the smell of this and it actually stays in my hair!! I have to braid my hair to manage it, and when I let it out, it smells so heavenly. Even with it out and not concentrated with the braids, it smells so good. Multiple people have told me I smell good when I hug them. Even if I skip a couple days of washing, it smells good! I'm going to try out more scents!I love that this is military member affiliated/owned and that a portion is donated to support vets and their families. I have a lot of military members in my family and it's nice that I can support others out there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Better than regular soap
reviews.reviewText: Update January 2024:Even though I love this soap, I’m knocking off one star because Bravo Sierra has stopped offering the unscented version, and the price has increased from $9.99 to $12 (actually $14 on their website) within the last 3 months. I loved this soap for its value and quality. Don’t lose loyal customers. Find another way to deal with inflation. A bar of soap shouldn’t be $12… Also, since my initial review, I’ve tried some of the scented versions, and love them just as much. I used it on my hair too, and it works just as well as natural shampoos I’ve tried. The Fig & Sandalwood scent smells exactly like a classic barbershop (or Pinaud-Clubman After Shave, IYKYK). But again, with all of that, I’d love to see the unscented version come back and for the price to be more reasonable.Original Review:When I first opened the box, I was a little concerned by the hairline fractures you can see in this photo because of another review that mentions the soap falling apart. So I purposely tried to break it… and it’s fine. These fractures are clearly a result of the way the soap is made but don’t affect its durability at all. I’ve been using the soap for about a week now, and it’s holding up. As far as smell, I wouldn’t call it scent-free (but there is no fragrance added). The ingredients it’s made with have their own subtle, pleasant scent that is kind of powdery. This soap lathers really nicely, and I don’t need to rub it all over my body to get it to spread. I just wet the bar and rub it between my hands, and it makes a ton of lather that I can use all over. I would describe the lather and the feeling of the soap as milky. It feel luxurious. The soap also doesn’t leave that classic soapy film or tacky feeling on my skin. After my shower, I feel refreshed, clean, and natural. The subtle scent lingers just long enough without being intrusive. I haven’t tried it on my hair (and probably won’t), but I’m satisfied with the soap so far!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I being using this soap for some time alreadyLives a great smell and soft skin.Love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Why does it cost this much?
reviews.reviewText: First started buying these in 2022 for $6.97 a bar and it was great. Excellent scent, lather, longevity, etc. Since then the price has gone up to $14 listed on their website but they haven't changed a thing about it and their products have become scarcer on amazon. They don't even sell their hair paste anywhere any more despite how great it was and all the glowing reviews it got. Not sure what is going on but it's a real shame. May end up swapping to a different brand before long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best Non-Soap…Soap there is
reviews.reviewText: Like many people I’ve been searching for that one perfect sudsy, lathery, great smelling, bar of soap. I’m happy to say my search has ended with the Bravo Sierra Cleansing Bar.First let me start by saying this isn’t even a bar of “soap”…it has all natural ingredients that won’t get irritating chemicals onto or into your body…or waste water (the fishes of the world thank you). It’s all natural ingredients have won it the “cradle to cradle” certification meaning it’s ingredients are either naturally occurring in the environment or they mimic naturally occurring elements in the environment.Second…Let me assure you this cleansing bar works on your whole body. It is designed to be a complete shampoo and body bar…and it leaves my hair, beard and body squeaky clean and with its scent of cedar wood and lavender leaves you smelling super clean and refreshed.Lastly…This Cleansing bar comes in a 7.0 Ounce bar! It’s much larger than an ordinary bar of soap. I shower daily and each bar lasts me 30-40 washes!..so you’re getting a lot more use from just one bar vs ordinary bar soap.I only use Bravo Sierra Cleansing Bars for my showering. They also have a great line of deodorants that are superb. But that’s for another review.Hope this was helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Made the switch for good.
reviews.reviewText: I've been trying to kick using body wash. I got hooked on Bravo Sierra deodorant first. Then I tried the soap. Love it. Combined with a soap bag I'll never use body wash again. Rinses clean and doesn't leave a ridiculously strong scent. The brick is a generous size and will last you for a good long while. I'm really impressed by their products.
